author: Vedant Mehra
description: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.Special ingredient #1: Banana peel syrup (Banana rind and water in a ratio of 1:2. Boil and reduce until desired consistency. Strain and store in an airtight container.)
name: Limitless

recipeInstructions.text: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
Special ingredient #1: Banana peel syrup (Banana rind and water in a ratio of 1:2
Boil and reduce until desired consistency
Strain and store in an airtight container
